Package model

Class GameConfigurationModel

java.lang.Object
model.GameConfigurationModel
public class GameConfigurationModel extends Object
Represents the model for configuring the game before starting. It allows setting player mode, logger mode, adding players, and updating the logger settings.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameConfigurationModel

      public GameConfigurationModel(Model model, long seed, int playerMode, int loggerMode, boolean playerInteraction, boolean renderGame)
      Constructs a GameConfigurationModel with the specified model, player mode, and logger mode.
      Parameters:
      model - the game model.
      playerMode - the player mode (0: Human vs. Human, 1: Human vs. AI, 2: AI vs. AI).
      loggerMode - the logger mode (0: None, 1: Debug).

    • GameConfigurationModel

      public GameConfigurationModel(Model model, int playerMode, int loggerMode, boolean playerInteraction, boolean renderGame)

      Parameters:

      public void setRenderGame(boolean renderGame)
      Whether to render the game. It's useful to disable rendering for AI testing.
      Parameters:
      renderGame - defines whether the game should be rendered.
